name: Jigsaw Madness
description: Jigsaw Madness is the international release of Jigsaw Island: Japan Graffiti. It includes all of the standard modes from the original game, including the 4-player battle and single-player free modes, but does not include the story mode from the original release.
alsoFor: PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita | Combined View
